attributes.action: Limit the numbers of Economic Migrants entering the Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simply limit the huge numbers of economic migrants annually entering the UK. They are of little economic benefit according to figures produced by migration watch and are placing a great strain on our society. The fact that we no longer control our own borders is very worrying.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
